id: Apply: A minimal and interactive resume for designers, photographers, artists, and illustrators
name: Apply: A minimal and interactive resume for designers, photographers, artists, and illustrators
description: Apply is a minimal and interactive resume powered by Notion and Super that gives you the confidence to go after your dream job in style. Apply makes it easy to stand out with custom background, text, and accent colors.
